'''Gifts of Encounter''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 4.0]].

==Duration==
* September 27, 2023 to October 6, 2023 (UTC+8)

==Rules==
# If you sign in for 7 days in total, you can obtain an extra Primogems ×60!
# Go to HoYoLAB Community > Tools > Genshin Impact > Check-In to participate in the sign in event!
